City Services
=============

Animal Control - Dedicated to rabies eradication, reducing animal euthanasia and controlling the animal population through a cooperative effort with the community. For more information please call the Grayson Country Animal control office at (903) 465-2878

**[Building Services](https://cityofpottsboro.com/index.asp?SEC=731CDEC8-A386-450F-8E42-C981BC1C4F79&Type=B_BASIC)**

**[City Council](https://cityofpottsboro.com/index.asp?SEC=890377E1-C7CA-4D8B-9533-CC6BD6641D4C&Type=B_LIST)**

City Council - The City Council serves as the community's legislative body, enacts City ordinances, and provides policy direction to City staff. All Six members of the Pottsboro City Council represent the entire city at large. There are no single member districts. Members serve staggered two year terms and govern under the laws of the State of Texas and the City of Pottsboro Ordinances.

**[City Manager](https://cityofpottsboro.com/index.asp?SEC=F1B71B28-4426-4330-A386-092F3E71C218&Type=B_BASIC)**

City Manager - The City Manager is the chief executive officer of the City and is responsible for the overall management of City operations.

**[City Secretary](https://cityofpottsboro.com/index.asp?SEC=F1B71B28-4426-4330-A386-092F3E71C218&Type=B_BASIC)**

City Clerk - The City Secretary's Office manages official records, Council agendas, boards and commissions, municipal elections.

**[Fire Department](https://cityofpottsboro.com/index.asp?SEC=AEBF4703-0FD6-48B9-B889-8A43BA342FCB&Type=B_BASIC)**

**[Municipal Court](https://cityofpottsboro.com/index.asp?SEC=F20E0AF6-77CB-4401-88A1-42FD8FCC39ED&Type=B_BASIC)**

Responsible for administering the operations of the judicial branch of City government.

**[Parks & Recreation](https://cityofpottsboro.com/index.asp?SEC=C715B55E-A47A-4408-B8E1-9443456A828C&Type=B_BASIC)**

Recreational activities in the city include trails, parks, and various athletic field complexes.

**[Planning & Zoning Commission](https://cityofpottsboro.com/index.asp?Type=B_BASIC&SEC={4840D674-36A4-41C0-90EB-E1A1F53BE3E0})**

Responsible for platting, zoning, code enforcement.
**[Police Services](https://cityofpottsboro.com/index.asp?SEC=8F80D059-BF3C-40E2-BFE4-F148D590C4A5&Type=B_BASIC)**

Crime prevention, police reports, police contact information.

**[Public Works](https://cityofpottsboro.com/index.asp?SEC=F1B71B28-4426-4330-A386-092F3E71C218&Type=B_BASIC)**

Responsible for the maintenance of the City Streets, Water & Sewer System, and Storm Drainage within the City of Pottsboro.

**[Stormwater Management](https://cityofpottsboro.com/index.asp?SEC=089DB5A0-9D23-4B4F-ACCA-49A71D1FBACA&Type=B_BASIC)**

To report potential water pollution issues, please contact 903-786-2281.

**[Utility Billing](https://cityofpottsboro.com/index.asp?SEC=089DB5A0-9D23-4B4F-ACCA-49A71D1FBACA&Type=B_BASIC)**
